mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT p.* FROM sys_user as u LEFT JOIN sys_user_role as ur on u.id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role_permission as rp on rp.role_id = ur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_permission as p on rp.permission_id = p.id WHERE u.id = #{userId} ORDER BY p.order_num asc
SELECT DISTINCT p.* FROM sys_permission p JOIN sys_role_permission rp on rp.permission_id = p.id JOIN sys_role r ON r.id = rp.role_id WHERE r.id = #{roleId}
